Introduction

Sungchan is a South Korean rapper under SM Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group RIIZE and a former member of the boy group NCT and its sub-unit NCT U.

In September of 2020, it was announced that Sungchan and Shotaro would debut in NCT with the Album NCT Resonance Pt. 1 on October 12. He was officially introduced in a V live broadcast on September 23.

Three years later, SM announced Sungchan's departure from NCT to join their new boy group, RIIZE. Their debut single album "Get A Guitar" was released on September 4, 2023.
